faq.question: What jobs are available in web3
faq.answer: Software Engineer, Marketing, Law, Economics, Finance, and more

faq.question: Why should I puruse this field?
faq.answer: Tbh it's up to you, web3 is said to be an evolving field, though we're still in the early days of it meaning it can either go sideways or continue pacing up. It's a risk you must be wiling to take

faq.question: How can i get involved?
faq.answer: join groupchats such as the Midwest Blockchain Conference chat where it's filled with majority students. There ask whatever you want and people will guide you
